input.sentences: [female] and [male] set off on their road trip to the old farm house .
they passed over several old bridges on their way .
they stopped to wade in some rapids .
finally | after a couple hours of driving | they started to see lots of green fields .
just before sunset | they made it to the old farm | where they were staying on vacation .
output.sentences: We were set to take our trip and decided to travel some scenic roads along the way.
I was amazed by some of the old bridges we passed.
After being in the car for several hours we were ready to stretch so we stopped to wade in the river by the rapids.
After feeling a bit more energized we figured we better get started again because we still had lots of hours to travel.
However, we seriously considered staying on that stretch of road and changing our vacation plans as we watched the sunset.
